item.title: Odisha lines up mega events in 5 cities to celebrate FIH Men’s Hockey World Cup
item.description: Odisha lines up mega events in 5 cities to celebrate FIH Men’s Hockey World Cup Bhubaneswar: Odisha, the sports capital of India, is yet again ready to host the FIH (International Hockey Federation) Men’s Hockey World Cup 2023.

item.title: Harmanpreet Singh Named Captain For India's FIH Pro League Matches
item.description: Harmanpreet Singh Named Captain For India’s FIH Pro League Matches Harmanpreet Singh was on Tuesday appointed captain of a 22-member Indian men's hockey team for the season opening FIH Pro League matches against Spain and New Zealand in Bhubaneswar
